name: centipede_damascus
text: It's a good thing Vlad is a robot, or he would be having mad diarrhea right about now.

name: goriasxy
text: My favourite thing about this strip is how Vlad gets so close to Lie Bot to tell him that he ate the soap.

name: kylemcjuicy
text: I think we've all been in Vlad's shoes

name: mortshire
text: his mod, mod shoes.

name: letterswewrote
text: ha, again onstad's proclivity for the mod style.

name: carpetbag
text: Robots can't eat dinner, but they can drink beer.

name: slalvation
text: Robots run on beer.

name: saucy_jack
text:
There is another option:

Lie Bot was lying about that.

name: comrade_tom
text: chubbied for the avatar.

name: saucy_jack
text: As if in some kind of bizarre negative reaction to approval, I almost immediately decided that what I really wanted was to replace Withnail and Marwood with Vlad.

name: comrade_tom
text:
I'm going to give your avatar chubbies untill you change it to something no-one could possibly chubby (even in an ironic sense).

*disclaimer this is an empty threat

name: jstegall
text: Eating the soap in the shower. I've been there.

name: farqussus
text: Me too. Eating the soap's a metaphor, right?

name: dusty
text: in Firefox your avatar is really rocking his ass off, but in internet explorer hes just casually plucking away as he slowly stumbles around.

name: apocowarg
text: CAT BANK!

name: dusty
text: I just saw a few days ago there's a new Catbank cartoon. Someone should make a Snugglesworth avatar so we can have a cat/counter-cat discussion.

name: ssddr
text: The last 2 pannels sum up Vlad so perfectly

name: psykeres
text: Phlod's accent comes through very clearly in this one, I like that.

name: untilyouaresonude
text:
I wanted my name to be 'igotsohornyiatethesoap" for this assetbar thing, but someone had taken it already. And they never even post.

Fucker.

name: straw
text: It's fine "untilyouaresonude" is pretty good too

name: closefriend
text: Vlad leans in to emphasize just how horny he was. That's a good way to make your friends really comfortable around you.

name: spectre
text: It works for Ray, too.

name: wargasmic
text: He ate the soap. As far as I'm concerned, there's no need for emphasis.

name: atypicaloracle
text: Uch, God, I can practically *smell* him in that panel - beer, Aqua Velva, heated metal...

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "Tomorrow: Vlad, the make-out king" Yes, a repeat of the previous day.

name: stuart
text: Tomorrow's recipe: Chicken!

name: boswelljn
text: my, my, do robots get horny. Eating soap is an unfathomable level of arousal.

name: meetzorp
text: That is hell of horny.

name: professorhazard
text: We have all been this horny.

name: spinynorman
text: I... Incorrect.

name: professorhazard
text: You're looking at the wrong kind of ladies, SN.

name: zapatos
text:
The kinds of ladies that aren't dudes.

Hey guys SpinyNorman is a homo pass it on

name: relaxing
text: Lie Bot is wearing the shoes he got from Michael J. Fox.

name: thegrayhoodie
text: Man I haven't been that horny since I...EVER really.

name: rowboat
text: It's unsettling to witness Lie Bot amongst his own ilk. All genuine. All affable. I kind of hate him for that.

name: hateandwar
text: I love that the alt text for the previous strip was also "Tomorrow: Vlad- The Make-Out King".

name: d-pad
text:
I was that horny once. It's actually a pretty good remedy if you have a severe enough case. Once you're focused on how bad it tastes and can't stop vomiting, you're suddenly a lot less horny.

Well, most people are anyway.

name: mattylite
text: Ya, eating soap really gives a guy the rough chuckles like nothin'.

name: i_love_kate
text: That's not a beer that Vlad's drinking. It's a pint glass of pure mouthwash. That make-out machine never switches off.

name: kickstart
text: If it's a dollar for a shot of Scope, how much would a pint of it run?  This is left as an exercise for the reader.

name: belgand
text: A comment left by belgand was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tasteful, Omegatron, Satyr)

name: dorothypoopbot
text: Wasn't Penny from Vegas? Did he...?

name: taskmaster
text: I like the idea of Vlad furiously gulping down beer, all: "gulpgulpgulpgulpgulpgulp". For all we know, he's still worn out from all his horniness.
